applet.name: RetroBrowser
applet.title: Retro Browser
applet.desc: Emulate the Squeezebox graphics user interface on your Squeezebox Controller/SqueezePlay

plugin.name: BBCiPlayer
plugin.title: BBCiPlayer
plugin.desc: Listen to BBC iPlayer Live and Listen Again Radio streams. Supports the highest quality AAC or MP3 streams available from the BBC for your location. Users outside the UK are now able to receive restricted bitrate versions of all of the content available to UK users. This includes listen again recordings of the last 7 days of BBC National, Regional and Local Radio from the UK.
plugin.creator: Triode

plugin.name: InfoBrowserSlimForums
plugin.title: Slim Forums
plugin.desc: InfoBrowser Addon for reading the latest posts on Slim Devices Forums
plugin.creator: Triode

plugin.name: InfoBrowserBBC
plugin.title: BBC News and Sport
plugin.desc: InfoBrowser Addon for reading BBC News and Sports pages
plugin.creator: Triode

plugin.name: InfoBrowserTvGuideCoUk
plugin.title: TvGuide.co.uk
plugin.desc: InfoBrowser Addon for reading UK TV listings from TvGuide.co.uk
plugin.creator: Triode

plugin.name: SigGen
plugin.title: Signal Generator
plugin.desc: Signal Generator plugin. Now supports Squeezeplay as well as SB2/3/Transporter.
plugin.creator: Triode

plugin.name: SwitchPlayer
plugin.title: Switch Player
plugin.desc: Switch Player allows you to transfer the currently playing playlist from one player to another as you move between rooms. It ensures the new player is powered on, transfers the current playlist and playing song or remote stream to the new player and then turns off the old player.
plugin.creator: Triode
